title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
block printed on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 128.5 x 65 cm (50 9/16 x 25 9/16 in.)
Repeat H x W: 36.8 x 32.4 cm (14 1/2 x 12 3/4 in.)
description:
Square repeat of two placements the same group of naturalistic flowers in a diamond-shaped grouping - one group facing left in one row and one groupd facing right in the alternating offset row. Floral groups interconnected by fine vine. Colors muted on a pale brown background. Square repeat  - unit: 14 1/2" high x 12 3/4" wide. 

Technique: Intaglio print plus relief print (?) on a plain weave fabric.
